DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of a diet supplementation with plant sterol esters on serum lipids, plant sterol concentrations and monocyte subpopulations.
DOC.brief_title: Differential Effects of a Diet Supplementation With Plant Sterol Esters on Human Monocytes
DOC.detailed_description: This study investigates effects of a diet supplementation with plant sterol esters on serum lipids, plant sterol concentrations and monocyte subpopulations.
DOC.criteria: healthy individuals without known cardiovascular diseases drugs that interfere with cholesterol metabolism other use of dietary supplements vegetarianism
